# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(VASP_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(VASP)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VASPPluginInfo.C
VASPCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
VASPPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
VASPMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVASPFileFormat.C
avtOUTCARFileFormat.C
avtCHGCARFileFormat.C
avtPOSCARFileFormat.C
avtXDATFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VASPEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVASPFileFormat.C
avtOUTCARFileFormat.C
avtCHGCARFileFormat.C
avtPOSCARFileFormat.C
avtXDATFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVASPDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVASPDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVASPDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MVASPDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MVASPDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MVASPDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MVASPDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVASPDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVASPDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVASPDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVASPDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVASPDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVASPDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVASPDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVASPDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases VASP ${INSTALLTARGETS})
